creditline: Gift of James. F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: sideboard, style of Hepplewhite; a central long upper drawer above two doors concealing storage space, is flanked by a door on either side; oval brasses. satinwood fan inlays at corners; six slender tapering legs, two at rear, four in front; the particular feature is the diagonal setting of the central pair of legs
title: Sideboard
